channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Alojapro Widget

item.title: CVE-2021-24530|2024-08-03T19:35:19.983Z -- unknown -- alojapro%20widget
item.description: The Alojapro Widget WordPress plugin through 1.1.15 doesn't properly sanitise its Custom CSS settings, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
